hero.title: Motion that moves minds.
hero.subtitle: We craft cinematic brand films, explainers, and digital content that captivates. Jarwater is a boutique motion studio for brands that demand artistry.

process.label: Our Process
process.title: We distill complex ideas into
process.step1Description: We dive deep into your brand's core message. We craft scripts that speak to your audience and define the visual language before a single pixel is pushed.
process.step2Description: Every frame is designed intentionally. We build comprehensive style frames and storyboards to ensure the vision aligns perfectly with your brand guidelines.
process.step3Description: The magic happens here. We breathe life into static assets with fluid motion and immersive sound design for a broadcast-ready finish.

capabilities.label: Capabilities
capabilities.explainersDescription: Clarify your product or service. We turn technical manuals and abstract concepts into engaging narratives that drive conversion.
capabilities.motionDescription: Elevate your brand identity. From logo animations to full broadcast packages, we create systems of movement that define your brand.
capabilities.adsDescription: Stop the scroll. We produce high-octane, short-form content optimized for social media performance and digital marketing campaigns.

explainers.heroSubtitle: Transform complex ideas into compelling visual stories that educate, engage, and convert.
explainers.whatWeDoDescription: We specialize in creating animated explainer videos that break down complex products, services, and concepts into digestible, engaging content. Our videos help businesses communicate their value proposition clearly and memorably.
explainers.type1Description: Showcase your product's features and benefits through dynamic visual demonstrations that highlight key functionality.
explainers.type2Description: Guide users through your software with intuitive animated tutorials that reduce onboarding friction.
explainers.type3Description: Create engaging educational content that makes learning enjoyable and retention higher.
explainers.type4Description: Welcome new users or employees with clear, friendly animated introductions to your platform or company.
explainers.process1Description: We start by understanding your audience, goals, and key messages to craft a targeted narrative.
explainers.process2Description: Our writers develop compelling scripts while our artists visualize every scene.
explainers.process3Description: We bring your story to life with custom illustrations and fluid animation.
explainers.process4Description: Professional voiceover and sound design complete the experience.
explainers.ctaDescription: Let's create an explainer video that converts viewers into customers.

motionGraphics.heroSubtitle: Elevate your brand with dynamic visual systems that capture attention and communicate instantly.
motionGraphics.whatWeDoDescription: Motion graphics bring static design to life. We create dynamic visual content that enhances brand recognition, engages audiences, and delivers messages with impact. From subtle logo animations to full broadcast packages, we craft movement that matters.
motionGraphics.type1Description: Give your logo life with custom animations that reinforce brand identity across all touchpoints.
motionGraphics.type2Description: Develop comprehensive motion guidelines that ensure consistency across all animated content.
motionGraphics.type3Description: Create stunning stage graphics, LED content, and live event animations that wow audiences.
motionGraphics.type4Description: Full motion identity systems for TV, streaming, and digital broadcast applications.
motionGraphics.process1Description: We study your brand DNA to ensure every movement feels authentically yours.
motionGraphics.process2Description: Multiple creative directions explored and refined based on your feedback.
motionGraphics.process3Description: Meticulous crafting of every keyframe, easing curve, and transition.
motionGraphics.process4Description: Comprehensive file packages optimized for every platform and use case.
motionGraphics.ctaDescription: Let's create motion that defines your visual identity.

digitalAds.heroSubtitle: Scroll-stopping content engineered for performance across every digital platform.
digitalAds.whatWeDoDescription: In the attention economy, every second counts. We create high-impact digital advertising content designed to capture attention, deliver your message, and drive action. Our ads are optimized for performance across social media, display networks, and digital platforms.
digitalAds.type1Description: Platform-native content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and beyond.
digitalAds.type2Description: Conversion-focused video ads designed for paid social and programmatic campaigns.
digitalAds.type3Description: Build anticipation with cinematic trailers and promotional content.
digitalAds.type4Description: Animated display ads that stand out in crowded digital spaces.
digitalAds.process1Description: We design for each platform's unique specifications, behaviors, and best practices.
digitalAds.process2Description: Crafting those crucial first frames that stop the scroll.
digitalAds.process3Description: Agile workflows that deliver multiple variations for testing.
digitalAds.process4Description: Exports tailored for every placement, from Stories to In-Feed.
digitalAds.ctaDescription: Let's create ads that perform and convert.
